articles.content: Apple ha rilasciato una nuova versione della beta 4 di iOS 18, dedicata agli sviluppatori. Questo aggiornamento arriva a pochi giorni dalla distribuzione della prima versione della medesima, suggeren… [+3509 chars]

articles.author: Brett McCracken
articles.title: Quality Christian Music: 15 Artists to Watch
articles.description: These 15 lesser-known Christian artists are making excellent music in a variety of genres. If you’re looking for new Christian music, check them out.
articles.content: Every summer, I compile a list of quality Christian artists who I think should be on your radar (and playlists) if they arent already. (See my lists from 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023.) I try to p… [+10049 chars]
